channel.title: Sdk on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Sdk on TLDRBins

item.title: dotnet
item.description: Compile C# project (From Linux) Download dotnet # Check dotnet --info # Prepare mkdir <PROJECT_NAME> cd <PROJECT_NAME> # Init dotnet new console # Create .sln file dotnet new sln # Link .sln to .csproj dotnet sln <PROJECT_NAME>.sln add <PROJECT_NAME>.csproj # Add dependencies (optional) dotnet add package System.XXXX.XXXX.XXXX --version 1.0.0 +----------------------+ |Add Code to Program.cs| +----------------------+ # Build solution dotnet build # Run dotnet run
